titles.title: A bill to limit Federal emergency economic assistance payments to certain recipients.
A bill to limit Federal emergency economic assistance payments to certain recipients.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Limits to $150 billion in the aggregate all payments to any person (including affiliates) under the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) under the Emergency Economic Assistance Act of 2008 (EESA) or any other federal emergency economic assistance program.
